solution_line_template: So, {total_members} - {lemon_juice_members} = <<{total_members}-{lemon_juice_members}={remaining_members_after_lemon}>>{remaining_members_after_lemon} members did not order lemon juice.

Since {mango_juice_fraction_stated} of the remaining ordered mango juice, then {remaining_members_after_lemon} x {mango_juice_calculation_fraction} = <<{remaining_members_after_lemon}*{mango_juice_calculation_fraction}={mango_juice_members}>>{mango_juice_members} members ordered mango juice.
